annotations.title: Icon Rail (Tier 1)
annotations.note: Vertical strip of context icons. Click to switch between Global, Personal, and Project contexts. Active context shows full opacity, inactive at 40%.

annotations.title: Content Panel (Tier 2)
annotations.note: Expandable panel showing navigation items for the selected context. Header color and title change based on context.

annotations.title: Active Context Button
annotations.note: Shows current context. When a project is selected, displays project initials instead of the default icon.

annotations.title: Project Search
annotations.note: Search input to filter projects by name. Appears in Project Browser view.

annotations.title: My Projects Filter
annotations.note: Toggle filter to show only projects owned by the current user. Displays count of matching projects. Active state uses context color.

annotations.title: Cancel Switch Button
annotations.note: Appears when switching projects from an active project. Click to return to the previous project without selecting a new one.

annotations.title: Active Navigation Item
annotations.note: Shows selected item with context-colored background tint, left border, and text/icon color.

annotations.title: Utilities Section
annotations.note: Bottom section of icon rail with user profile, help, and theme toggle buttons.

annotations.title: Panel Collapse Button
annotations.note: Toggles the side nav panel between expanded and collapsed states. Icon changes direction based on state.

annotations.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
annotations.note: Shows current navigation path. Updates dynamically based on context and selected project/item.
